title: Kill the Hero - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manhwa   Antihero Protagonist   Average-looking Protagonist   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dungeons   Evil Organizations   Game Elements   Grinding   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Hunters   Lucky Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Merchants   Modern Day   Monsters   Necromancer   Overpowered Protagonist   Racism   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Strong to Stronger
author: D-Dart   디다트
description:
In a game-like world where dungeons, monsters, and players appear.

In that world, only I knew the truth.

“Let’s save the world together. Let’s put an end to this game.”

The secret that the man who’s idolized as the “Messiah who will save the world” is actually trying to rule it as its emperor.

Only I, who experienced his betrayal. I, who was murdered by him and returned to the past, know the truth.>
